text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode where concept is-a _MedicalDevice

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _MedicalDeviceMedicalDeviceA device with direct or indirect therapeutic purpose. Values for EntityCode when EntityClass = "DEV"

name: MedicalDevice
title: MedicalDevice
description: A device with direct or indirect therapeutic purpose. Values for EntityCode when EntityClass = "DEV"
